snippet: A Russian committee said Friday that it had detained six men suspected in a bombing in the southern city of Pyatigorsk last month that killed three people.
abstract: Russia’s federal Antiterrorist Committee says that it has detained six men suspected in a bombing in the southern city of Pyatigorsk, that killed three people and added to security fears ahead of the Winter Olympics.
lead_paragraph: A Russian committee said Friday that it had detained six men suspected in a bombing in the southern city of Pyatigorsk last month that killed three people.
